Key Match Events: The Lakers clawed back from an early 22-point deficit against the Suns
Austin Reaves led the charge with 26 points, 8 assists, and 3 steals
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Davis mentioned Jerry West and Elgin Baylor as players who started the season with similar high-scoring performances
LeBron James stated that Davis is the main focal point for the Lakers every night
JJ Redick praised Davis' intentionality and comfort level in the offense
The Lakers improved to 2-0 with this win
